meanings.meaning: 1. bird 肥えた鶏は卵を産まない。Fat hens lay few eggs.
2. bird meat (esp. chicken meat); fowl; poultry See also 鶏鳥は料理人がほどよく焼いた。The fowls were well roasted by the cook.
鶏 【とり】、禽 【とり】、トリ

meanings.meaning: 1. a little; a bit; slightly Usually written using kana aloneこの机は私にはちょっと低い。This desk is a little low for me.
2. just a minute; for a moment; briefly Usually written using kana aloneネクタイを締める間、ちょっとじっとしてね。Hold still a moment while I fix your tie.
3. somewhat; rather; fairly; pretty; quite Usually written using kana alone
5. hey!; come on; excuse me Usually written using kana aloneちょっと、そこのきみ！Hey, you there!
6. thanks, but no; not feasible; not possible Usually written using kana alone
一寸 【ちょと】、鳥渡 【ちょっと】、鳥渡 【ちょと】、チョット、ちょいと、チョッと
